title: 06/10/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/10/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin praises Chris Paul for his leadership and what he’s overcome in his NBA career as the Suns take a 2-0 lead over the Nuggets in the second round of the playoffs. He’s not buying the “PR War” going on between Aaron Rodgers and the Packers and shares what’s really the issue at hand here. He also explains why Dak Prescott finds a way to win on and off the field despite not being the most talented QB in the league. Plus, Packers insider Matt Schneidman joins the show to tell us how Jordan Love has looked in minicamp while Rodgers holds out. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
